idea-plugin.name: Jenkins Control Plugin
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 0.2: - Add Jenkins Security Support (See https://github.com/dboissier/jenkins-control-plugin/wiki to check how to and see limitations) - Add Settings shortcut on the upper toolbar
Version 0.1: - Initial version including the following features : - Server configuration, - Jenkins jobs display with autorefreshed job list and view selection, - Job Build runner, - Open Job web page and its last build web page on browser, - Autorefreshed Rss Reader View, - Autorefresh functions can be disabled on the Jenkins Configuration Panel.
